Recommendations: 1. Faculty may invest time in research to harness new knowledge to broaden the nursing education.
2. The college may need to engage in more collaborative researches in the local, national and international endeavor.
3. Research outputs may be presented in various fora both national and international settings.
4. Outsourcing to increase funding support and research assistance may be explored.
5. Students' participation in the formulation of the college research agenda may be considered.
